database.create: CREATE TABLE ticket_infor (Title VARCHAR(255), Priority INT(5), TakedDate VARCHAR(255), Issue VARCHAR(255), PDivision VARCHAR(255), ResolvedDate VARCHAR(255), TicketCode VARCHAR(255), Queue VARCHAR(255), ReasonName VARCHAR(255), TimeWorked VARCHAR(255), ServiceType VARCHAR(255), FoundEmail VARCHAR(255), TicketStatus VARCHAR(255), CreatedDate VARCHAR(255), PName VARCHAR(255), TicketID VARCHAR(255), PRIMARY KEY (TicketCode));
